channel.title: Why post with please...host my server!
channel.description:
Why would people host your server if they can host there own ooh they gonna get co-owner when they could get owner its just no point in posting need hoster..! it's your server host it yourself!!!
Post if your with me and agree 100% its a waste of time and a post!
Thanks Tyler

item.title: Why post with please...host my server!
item.dc:creator: @sriyegna sriyegna
item.description:
@sriyegna wrote:

thers also issues with ISP. if your internet provider only gives a certain amount of bandwith, or doesnt allow any hosting.

Read full topic
item.source: Why post with please...host my server!

item.title: Why post with please...host my server!

item.description:
@Tracytb wrote:

heck hes right tho. but lets say ur freind wants to host a server but cant and you can? and you dont already ahve 1 ur freind you’d “if good freind” host it for him

item.title: Why post with please...host my server!
item.dc:creator: @sriyegna sriyegna
item.description:
@sriyegna wrote:

well, some ppl may want to host for others and that decision is upto them lol and even if u do get a petition with a 100 signatures saying tht other ppl hosting other servers is bad… what makes u think theyre gna listen to u lol
